0001001010100001 1010111001101101 0 -> sum: 1100000100001110, cout: 0
1011010110110110 0011100011000011 0 -> sum: 1110111001111001, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
